Key Match Events: Pakistan persisted, with Shaheen Afridi providing crucial breakthroughs to reduce South Africa to 250 for eight
The last-wicket duo of Maharaj and Shamsi sees the side home
Miscellaneous Highlights: The nail-biting contest saw South Africa defeating Pakistan by one wicket on a day when fortunes swung wildly at the M.A. Chidambaram Stadium
Others: The World Cup got its first closely fought game after 26 matches
